original: Kirudd, Bror Sven Allan, direktör, Vänersborg, f. 5/12/08 i Kiruna, Norrb. 1., av grossh. Bror K. o. Sofia Eriksson. G. 34 m. Blenda Andersson. Barn: Gunilla f. 40. — Realex. 25, Holmqvists hand :inst. i Gbg 26, Sthlms tillskär :akad. 29. Res. t. Engl. 24, Tyskl 38. Anst. v. Kirudds A-B 26-41. Verkst. dir. i A-B Svenkonfektion i Vänersb. sed. 41, styr:led. där. Medl. i KAK, Bohusl. motorkl., Vänersb. filatelistkl. Hobbies: bil-körn., frimärkssaml., badminton, tennis.
translated: Kirudd, Bror Sven Allan, director, Vänersborg, b. 5/12/08 in Kiruna, Norrbotten 1st district, son of merchant Bror K. and Sofia Eriksson. Married in 1934 to Blenda Andersson. Children: Gunilla b. 1940. Completed secondary education in 1925, attended Holmqvist's business school in Gothenburg in 1926, and Stockholm tailoring academy in 1929. Traveled to England in 1924 and Germany in 1938. Employed by Kirudd's AB from 1926 to 1941. Executive director of AB Svenkonfektion in Vänersborg since 1941, also serving on the board of directors. Member of KAK (automobile club), Bohuslän motor club, and Vänersborg philatelic club. Hobbies: driving cars, stamp collecting, badminton, tennis.
